pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 8  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2, 2.5 on hard$(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(l:world/structures#stronghold)$(thing)Strongholds$() or after mining infested blocks $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Silverfish$() are small mobs found hiding in stone-like blocks in mountains, $(l:world/structures#stronghold)$(thing)Strongholds$(), $(l:world/structures#igloo)$(thing)Igloo$() basements and $(l:world/structures#mansion)$(thing)Woodland Mansions$().
